title: Fragment, 19th century
medium: plain compound twill and silk and gold on paper wound on silk core
description: Pattern of dragons, floral forms and flying clouds in extra wefts of gold, green, red, light blue silk and gold threads on dark blue twill ground - two selvages - for other component of the original accession numbered objects of this set [1942-86-21-a [deaccessioned], and  see also:

tombstone.epitaph: Fragment, 19th century.plain compound twill and silk and gold on paper wound on silk core. 1942-86-21-b.
